summary.span: 定义数据项和 控件中它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。

span.span: Defines the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果 控件绑定到数据源，其中每个数据项都包含多个字段（如具有多个属性的 XML 元素），则默认情况下，节点将显示数据项的 `ToString` 方法返回的值。When the control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 对于 XML 元素，该节点将显示元素名称，该名称显示树的基础结构，但在其他情况下不起作用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以通过指定树节点绑定将节点的属性绑定到特定的字段。You can bind the properties of a node to a specific field by specifying tree node bindings. 对象定义每个数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。A object defines the relationship between each data item and the node that it is binding to. 控件将其 对象存储在 属性中，并将绑定应用于数据源，以在树层次结构和数据源层次结构之间创建一对一关系。The control stores its objects in the property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the tree hierarchy and the data source hierarchy. 对于数据源中的每个数据项， 控件尝试将数据项与 对象匹配，以便创建相应的 对象。For each data item in the data source, the control attempts to match the data item to a object in order to create the corresponding object. 创建 对象时，必须指定绑定的条件。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 条件指示数据项应绑定到节点的时间。The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node. 您可以指定 或 属性，或同时指定这两个属性。You can specify the or property, or both properties. 通过同时指定这两个方法，可以稍微提高性能。There is a slight performance gain by specifying both. 节点深度指定要绑定的节点级别。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 例如，以下 声明将数据源的 `Name` 和 `ID` 字段分别绑定到深度为0的所有节点的 和 属性：For example, the following declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 数据成员指定基础数据源中数据项的类型，但可以根据数据源表示不同的信息。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 分层数据源（由 接口表示）中的每个数据项都公开了 属性，该属性指定数据项的类型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a interface) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 当数据源包含多个数据项类型时，数据成员将指定要使用的数据项类型。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 以下 声明将 控件的 `` 元素绑定到树中的所有节点，而与层次结构中的位置无关：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 建立绑定条件后，可以绑定可以绑定到值的 对象的属性。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以绑定到数据项或静态值的字段。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 绑定到静态值时，将应用 对象的所有 对象共享相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. > [!NOTE] > 通过直接在节点中设置相应的属性，可以有选择地覆盖 对象中的绑定属性。You can selectively override a bound property in a object by setting the corresponding property directly in the node. 下表列出了 类的属性，该属性允许你将 对象的属性绑定到数据项的字段。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a field of a data item. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的字段。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的字段。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的字段。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的字段。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的字段。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的字段。The field to bind to the property of a object.| 下表列出了 类的属性，该属性允许你将 对象的属性绑定到静态值。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a static value. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到 对象的 属性的静态值。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| 如果定义了冲突 的对象，则 控件会按以下优先级顺序应用树节点绑定：If conflicting objects are defined, the control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义和匹配深度和数据成员的 对象。The object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member. 2. 仅定义和匹配数据成员的 对象。The object that defines and matches the data member only. 3. 仅定义和匹配深度的 对象。The object that defines and matches the depth only. 4. 不定义深度和数据成员的 对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. （此类型的树节点绑定适用于树中的所有节点。）(This type of tree node binding is applied to all nodes in the tree.) 5. 数据源中没有匹配项的 对象。The object that does not have a match in the data source. 在这种情况下，数据项 `ToString` 方法返回的值将绑定到 对象应用到的节点的 和 属性。In this case, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item is then bound to the and properties of the nodes to which the object is applied. 使用 类，还可以通过设置 属性设置节点中显示的文本的格式。The class also allows you to format the text that is displayed in a node by setting the property. ## Examples 下表显示了一些示例树节点绑定声明。The following table shows some example tree node binding declarations. |示例绑定Example binding|说明Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |``|将树中所有节点的 和 属性分别绑定到数据源的 `Title` 和 `ID` 字段。Binds the and properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data source, respectively. 由于未设置 和 属性，所有节点都使用此树节点绑定声明。All nodes use this tree node binding declaration because the and properties are not set.| |``|将树中所有节点的 和 属性分别绑定到数据源中 `Book` 数据项的 `Title` 和 `ID` 字段。Binds the and properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively.| |``|将树中深度为2的所有节点的 和 属性分别绑定到数据源中数据项的 `Title` 和 `ID` 字段。Binds the and properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data item in the data source, respectively.| |``|将树中深度为2的所有节点的 和 属性分别绑定到数据源中 `Book` 数据项的 `Title` 和 `ID` 字段。Binds the and properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively. 还将节点的 属性绑定到静态值。Also binds the property of the nodes to a static value.| 本部分包含三个代码示例。This section contains three code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 对象以声明方式定义节点和数据项之间的关系。The first code example demonstrates how to use objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 对象以编程方式定义节点和数据项之间的关系。The second code example demonstrates how to use objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 第三个代码示例提供了第一个和第二个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The third code example provides sample XML data for the first and second code examples. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象以声明方式定义节点和数据项之间的关系。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象以编程方式定义节点和数据项之间的关系。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将下一个代码示例中提供的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data that is provided in the next code example to a file named Book.xml. ## Remarks 数据成员指定基础数据源中数据项的类型，但可以根据数据源表示不同的信息。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 分层数据源（由 对象表示）中的每个数据项都公开一个 属性，该属性指定数据项的类型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a object) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 当数据源包含多个数据项类型时，数据成员将指定要使用的数据项类型。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 以下 声明将 控件的 `` 元素绑定到树中的所有节点，而与层次结构中的位置无关：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 创建 对象时，必须指定绑定的条件。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 条件指示数据项应绑定到节点的时间。The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node. 您可以指定 或 属性，或同时指定这两个属性。You can specify the or property, or both properties. 通过同时指定这两个方法，可以稍微提高性能。There is a slight performance gain by specifying both. 建立绑定条件后，可以绑定可以绑定到值的 对象的属性。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以绑定到数据项或静态值的字段。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 绑定到静态值时，将应用 对象的所有 对象共享相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要绑定到节点的 XML 元素。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which XML element to bind to a node. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要绑定到节点的 XML 元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which XML element to bind to a node. 为了使此代码示例正常工作，您必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this code example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. ## Remarks 节点深度指定要绑定的节点级别。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 例如，以下 声明将数据源的 `Name` 和 `ID` 字段分别绑定到深度为0的所有节点的 和 属性：For example, the following declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 创建 对象时，必须指定绑定的条件。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 条件指示数据项应绑定到节点的时间。The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node. 您可以指定 或 属性，或同时指定这两个属性。You can specify the or property, or both properties. 通过同时指定这两个方法，可以稍微提高性能。There is a slight performance gain by specifying both. 建立绑定条件后，可以绑定可以绑定到值的 对象的属性。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以绑定到数据项或静态值的字段。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 绑定到静态值时，将应用 对象的所有 对象共享相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性以特定节点深度应用 对象。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a object at a specific node depth. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以特定节点深度应用 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a object at a specific node depth. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，指定 对象应用到的节点的文本显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 格式字符串，指定 对象应用到的节点的文本显示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性用于提供节点文本的自定义格式。The property is used to provide a custom format for a node's text. 数据格式字符串由以冒号分隔的两部分组成，格式为 {`A`： `Bxx`}。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，格式化字符串 `{0:F2}` 显示具有两个小数位的固定点数字。For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号中，以指示它是格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本都显示为文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒号前面的值（在常规示例中为`A`）指定从零开始的参数列表中的参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此值只能设置为0，因为每个节点中只有一个值。This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each node. 冒号后面的字符（在常规示例中为`B`）指定值的显示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|显示数值Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|货币格式。Currency format.| |`D`|小数格式。Decimal format.| |`E`|科学型（指数）格式。Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式。Fixed format.| |`G`|常规格式。General format.| |`N`|数字格式。Number format.| |`X`|十六进制格式。Hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 除 `X`以外，格式字符不区分大小写。Except for `X`, the format character is not case sensitive. `X` 格式字符在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified. 格式字符后的值（在常规示例中为`xx`）指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置后，可以使用设计器工具自动将 属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of the property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性为根节点中显示的文本指定自定义的显示格式。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the text that is displayed in the root node. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为根节点中显示的文本指定自定义的显示格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the text that is displayed in the root node. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的 属性的值。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 指定的文本为辅助技术设备提供了可用于使控件更易于访问的图像说明。The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 此绑定关系会影响 对象应用到的所有 对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 当在节点旁显示图像时，当鼠标指针置于图像上时，将显示工具提示文本。When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过直接设置每个节点的 属性，来有选择地重写 属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 您可以通过设置 属性，将 对象的 属性绑定到数据源的字段，而不是使用 属性将同一工具提示文本绑定到每个节点图像。Instead of using the property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node image, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的 属性的自定义图像。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify a custom image to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系会影响 对象应用到的所有 对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 只要客户端浏览器支持该格式，该图像将显示在节点旁边，并且可以是任何文件格式（.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等）。The image is displayed next to a node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过直接设置 属性来覆盖单个节点的图像。You can override the image for an individual node by setting its property directly. 您可以通过设置 属性，将 对象的 属性绑定到数据源的字段，而不是使用此属性将同一图像绑定到每个节点。Instead of using this property to bind the same image to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 当使用 属性在节点旁显示图像时，还应考虑设置 属性。When displaying an image next to a node with the property, you should also consider setting the property. 指定的工具提示文本为辅助技术设备提供了图像说明，可用于使控件更易于访问。The ToolTip text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性以特定节点深度应用 对象。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a object at a specific node depth. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 对象应用到的节点指定自定义图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for a node to which the object is applied. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 Booklist 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. ## Remarks 有时，由于数据大小或自定义内容依赖于用户输入而导致静态预定义树结构是不切实际的。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此， 控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 属性设置为 `true`时，应用 对象的节点的子节点在节点展开时在运行时填充。When the property is set to `true`, the child nodes of the node that the object is applied to gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 通过将 控件的 设置为 `true`来创建数据绑定时，创建的绑定的 属性设置为 `true`。When data bindings are created by setting the of the control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the property set to `true`. 以声明方式创建的数据绑定将 属性设置为 `false`。Data bindings that are created declaratively have the property set to `false`. 使用声明性语法允许您控制单个数据绑定的行为。Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings. > [!NOTE] > 与 类的 属性不同，如果使用的是数据源控件（如 ），则 属性不需要为 事件定义事件处理方法。Unlike the property of the class, the property does not require an event-handling method to be defined for the event, if you are using a data source control, such as . 相反， 控件将使用 集合中 对象的属性动态生成事件处理方法。Instead, the control dynamically generates an event-handling method using the properties of the objects in the collection. 你仍可以为 事件定义事件处理方法;但是，它将在 控件的事件处理方法后调用。You can still define an event-handling method for the event; however, it will be called after the event-handling method for the control. 支持的浏览器还可利用客户端节点填充。Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population. 启用后，这允许 控件在节点展开时在客户端上动态填充节点，从而不需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, preventing the need to post back to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on client-side node population, see . 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定是否为节点显示复选框。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定是否为节点显示复选框。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand/CS/treenodebindingpopulateondemandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand/VB/treenodebindingpopulateondemandvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的 属性的值。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系会影响 对象应用到的所有 对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于指定在选择节点时引发的事件。The property is used to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过直接设置每个节点的 属性，来有选择地重写 属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 下表列出了可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |`SelectAction` 值`SelectAction` value|说明Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|在展开和折叠之间切换节点。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 适当地引发 事件或 事件。Raises the event or the event, as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|在选定节点时引发 和 两个事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 节点只展开，从不折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 对于其 属性设置为 `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`的节点，不会呈现 。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定在单击节点时引发的事件。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定在单击节点时引发的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. ## Remarks 若要在 控件中提供多节点选择支持，可以在节点中的图像旁显示复选框。To provide multinode selection support in the control, you can display check boxes next to an image in the node. 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的 属性的值。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系会影响 对象应用到的所有 对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于显示或隐藏节点的复选框。The property is used to show or hide the check box for a node. > [!NOTE] > 尽管 属性可用于显示复选框，但更常见的情况是使用 控件的 属性。Although the property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the property of the control. 但 属性会影响属性指定的每个节点类型;因此， 属性通常用于重写 对象应用到的节点的设置。However, the property affects every node type that is specified by the property; therefore, the property is often used to override that setting for a node to which the object is applied. 可以通过直接设置每个节点的 属性，来有选择地重写 属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定是否为节点显示复选框。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定是否为节点显示复选框。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format:
## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的 属性的值。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系会影响 对象应用到的所有 对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于指定在单击节点时要在其中显示链接到节点的 Web 内容的窗口或框架。The property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 设置 属性将替代 对象应用到的节点的 控件的 属性。Setting the property overrides the property of the control for the nodes to which the object is applied. 可以通过直接设置每个节点的 属性，来有选择地重写 属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. > [!NOTE] > 属性作为 `target` 属性呈现。The property renders as a `target` attribute. XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许使用 `anchor` 元素的 `target` 属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果 控件的呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1，则不设置 属性。Do not set the property, if the rendered output for the control must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100)). > > 创建可访问的网页时，应避免使用 属性以面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228011(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228011(v=vs.100)). 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定与根节点关联的网页应显示在新窗口中。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定与根节点关联的网页应显示在新窗口中。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的 属性的值。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系会影响 对象应用到的所有 对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于指定节点中显示的文本。The property is used to specify the text displayed in a node. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过直接设置每个节点的 属性，来有选择地重写 属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 您可以通过设置 属性，将 对象的 属性绑定到数据源的字段，而不是使用 属性将同一文本绑定到每个节点。Instead of using the property to bind the same text to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要为 对象应用到的节点显示的值。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the value to display for a node to which the object is applied. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定要为 对象应用到的节点显示的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the value to display for a node to which the object is applied. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 Booklist 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的 属性的值。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系会影响 对象应用到的所有 对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于对 属性进行补充，方法是存储与 对象应用到的节点关联的任何附加数据。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the object is applied. 此值不会显示在控件中，通常用于存储用于处理回发事件的数据。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过直接设置每个节点的 属性，来有选择地重写 属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 您可以通过设置 属性，将 对象的 属性绑定到数据源的字段，而不是使用 属性将同一值绑定到每个节点。Instead of using the property to bind the same value to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ##
